text: Donkey Kong Land III (also called Donkey Kong Land 3) is a Game Boy video game that is a part of the Donkey Kong video game series. This game was released in 1997 by Nintendo and was developed by Rare, Ltd.. It was rereleased in 2000 exclusively in Japan for the Game Boy Color and is a sequel to Donkey Kong Land and Donkey Kong Land 2. title: Donkey Kong Land III
